ProcessSpecification.name: PIP5D8NotifyOfShipFromStockAndDebitAuthorizationConfirmation
ProcessSpecification.Documentation: This PIP enables a supplier to respond to the request of a distributor.

BusinessDocument.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation Notification
BusinessDocument.Documentation: Returns an authorization status and details from applicable line items per the quote number provided in the authorization request.

Package.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation

BusinessTransaction.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation

RequestingBusinessActivity.name: Initiate Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation Notification

DocumentEnvelope.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation Notification
DocumentEnvelope.businessDocument: //BusinessDocument[@name="Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation Notification"]

RespondingBusinessActivity.name: Process Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation Notification

BinaryCollaboration.name: Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation
BinaryCollaboration.Documentation: The PIP Start State is comprised of the following conditions: a. TPA Approved and Exist In Backend System b. Sending Partner Exist as Party and Valid c. Receiving Partner Exist as Party d. Business Document Exist In Backend System, Valid, Non-Repudiated and Authorized

The PIP End States are comprised of the following conditions: a. Acknowledgment of Receipt Exist In Backend System, Valid and Non-Repudiated b. Receiving Partner Authorized ; PIP Failure State: a. NOT Successful b. Retry Count Exceeded

Start.toBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation"]

BusinessTransactionActivity.businessTransaction: //BusinessTransaction[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation"]

Failure.fromBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Notify of Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation"]
